testcase.name: testSimpleTagName
testcase.system-out: AST for doc("test.xml")/book: AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / TagName: book

testcase.name: testComplexQueries
testcase.system-out:
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")//book[@id="1"]//author[text()]/. AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: // Slash: Filter: DoubleSlash: Filter: TagName: book TagName: author Self (.)
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/bookstore/book[price and ./author]/title AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Slash: Filter: Slash: TagName: bookstore TagName: book TagName: title
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")//book[../bookstore/@type="fiction"]/author AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: // Slash: Filter: TagName: book TagName: author

testcase.name: testFilters
testcase.system-out:
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book[title] AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Filter: TagName: book
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book[price = text()] AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Filter: TagName: book
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book[price eq text()] AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Filter: TagName: book
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book[. == ..] AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Filter: TagName: book
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book[. is ..] AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Filter: TagName: book
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book[@id = "1"] AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Filter: TagName: book
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book[(price = text())] AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Filter: TagName: book
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book[price and title] AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Filter: TagName: book
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book[price or title] AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Filter: TagName: book
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book[not price] AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Filter: TagName: book

testcase.name: testDoubleSlashPath
testcase.system-out: AST for doc("test.xml")//book: AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: // TagName: book

testcase.name: testComplexPath
testcase.system-out: AST for doc("test.xml")/book/title: AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Slash: TagName: book TagName: title

testcase.name: testComplexFilter
testcase.system-out: AST for doc("test.xml")/book[title and @id="1"]: AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Filter: TagName: book

testcase.name: testAttribute
testcase.system-out: AST for doc("test.xml")/book/@id: AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Slash: TagName: book Attribute: @id

testcase.name: testFilter
testcase.system-out: AST for doc("test.xml")/book[@id="1"]: AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Filter: TagName: book

testcase.name: testRelativePathOperations
testcase.system-out:
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book/* AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Slash: TagName: book Wildcard (*)
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book/. AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Slash: TagName: book Self (.)
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book/.. AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Slash: TagName: book Parent (..)
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book/text() AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Slash: TagName: book
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book/@id AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Slash: TagName: book Attribute: @id
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book/(title) AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Slash: TagName: book
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book/author AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: / Slash: TagName: book TagName: author
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")//book AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: // TagName: book
Testing XPath: doc("test.xml")/book,author AbsolutePath: File: test.xml Type: /
